gate.alignment.gui

Interface IteratingMethod

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultIteratingMethod

    public interface IteratingMethod
extends Serializable
    This interface declares a method that needs to be implemented by the implementors of this interface. The purpose of this interface is to allow users to define their own iterating sequence for the alignment editor. For example, it could be a sentence alignment algorithm.
    Author:
    niraj

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the last retrieved pair.

      Returns true if there is any next pair available to return.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(CompoundDocument compoundDocument,
        String srcDocumentId,
        String tgtDocumentId,
        String srcInputAS,
        String tgtInputAS,
        String srcTokenAnnotationType,
        String tgtTokenAnnotationType,
        String srcUnitAnnotationType,
        String tgtUnitAnnotationType)
          throws IteratingMethodException
        This method, given necessary parameters, initialises the internal resources.
        Parameters:
        compoundDocument - - source document for which alignment is taking place
        srcDocumentId - - id of the source document
        tgtDocumentId - - id of the target document
        srcInputAS - - annotation set in the source document which to take annotations from
        tgtInputAS - - annotation set in the target document which to take annotations from
        srcTokenAnnotationType - - e.g. Token for word alignment
        tgtTokenAnnotationType - - e.g. Token for word alignment
        srcUnitAnnotationType - - e.g. Sentence for sentence alignment
        tgtUnitAnnotationType - - e.g. Sentence for sentence alignment
        Throws:
        IteratingMethodException - - could throw exception if something is wrong with the parameters or with the source and target documents.

      • getText

        String getText(gate.Annotation annot,
             String documentId)
        Retrieves the underlying text for the given annotation in the document with given document id.
        Parameters:
        annot -
        documentId -
        Returns:

      • getUnderlyingAnnotations

        gate.AnnotationSet getUnderlyingAnnotations(gate.Annotation annot,
                                          String documentId,
                                          String annotationType)
        Similar to getContained method of the gate.AnnotationSet.
        Parameters:
        annot - - this method uses annot.getStartNode().getOffset() and annot.getEndNode().getOffset() to decide boundaries.
        documentId - - id of the document to be used in the compound document.
        annotationType - - type of the annotations to be retrieved
        Returns:
        gate.AnnotationSet with annotations of type annotationType
